医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
从 LED 屏幕到基因：蓝光对果蝇衰老和 m6A 甲基化的影响研究人员利用多组学图谱创建了果蝇模型，以阐明日常低强度蓝光暴露 (BLE) 的生物学机制和影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/From-LED-screens-to-genes-The-effects-of-blue-light-on-aging-and-m6A-methylation-in-fruit-苍蝇.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/From-LED-screens-to-genes-The-effects-of-blue-light-on-aging-and-m6A-methylation-in-fruit- flies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=64db7072-ef71-44ff-91ef-79c36da00537 Thu, 07 Dec 2023 07:08:00 -0500 From LED screens to genes: The effects of blue light on aging and m6A methylation in fruit flies
马来刺叶提取物可有效治疗糖尿病且毒性较低Psychotria malayana Jack 叶提取物 (OE)，评估其抗糖尿病、抗炎和抗氧化特性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Psychotria-malayana-Jack-leaf-extract-could- effectively-treat-diabetes-with-lower-毒理学.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Psychotria-malayana-Jack-leaf-extract-could- effectively-treat-diabetes-with-lower-毒理.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99a60179-b725-459c-9cc8-324d27e15512 Thu, 07 Dec 2023 06:41:00 -0500 Psychotria malayana Jack leaf extract could effectively treat diabetes with lower toxicity
Optibrium 的量子力学和机器学习方法预测药物代谢途径发表在 Xenobiotica 上的同行评审研究描述了一种创新的新方法，该方法比其他方法具有更高的灵敏度和更高的精度来预测 I 期和 II 期代谢的途径和产物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Optibriume28099s-Quantum-Mechanics-and-Machine-Learning-Methods-Predict-Routes-of-Drug-Metabolism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Optibriume28099s-Quantum-Mechanics-and-Machine-Learning-Methods-Predict-Routes-of-Drug-Metabolism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=265ba288-31d2-466e-8ff1-bfaca9244cfd Thu, 07 Dec 2023 06:09:00 -0500 Optibrium’s Quantum Mechanics and Machine Learning Methods Predict Routes of Drug Metabolism
BICO 公司 Biosero 已签署协议，开发价值 28 MUSD 的实验室自动化解决方案Biosero 是一家 BICO 公司，也是协调科学发现的实验室自动化解决方案开发商，已与一家全球生命科学公司签署了一份总价值 28 MUSD 的协议，旨在设计和构建一个自动化研发、硬件和软件平台，该平台由 5 个子系统组成-项目。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/BICO-company-Biosero-has-signed-an-agreement-to-develop-laboratory-automation-solutions-to-a-value-of-28- MUSD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/BICO-company-Biosero-has-signed-an-agreement-to-develop-laboratory-automation-solutions-to-a-value-of-28- MUSD.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8196abbc-4fce-4c40-ae5c-689ed810a175 Thu, 07 Dec 2023 06:06:00 -0500 BICO company Biosero has signed an agreement to develop laboratory automation solutions to a value of 28 MUSD
识别帕金森病可避免的危险因素帕金森病 (PD) 可避免的危险因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Identification-of-avoidable-risk-factors-for-Parkinsone28099s-Disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Identification-of-avoidable-risk-factors-for-Parkinsone28099s-Disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e584bf28-8079-4f1a-9545-34b9fafd4d5f Thu, 07 Dec 2023 05:44:00 -0500 Identification of avoidable risk factors for Parkinson’s Disease
听力障碍会增加患痴呆症的风险吗？听力障碍与未来痴呆症之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Does-hearing-impairment-increase-the-risk-of-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Does-hearing-impairment-increase-the-risk-of-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a9593ae-2b3e-40c5-aa67-45126c67c6cd Thu, 07 Dec 2023 03:58:00 -0500 Does hearing impairment increase the risk of dementia?
人工智能有助于早期发现乳腺癌人工智能的使用使得乳腺癌高危女性可以在乳房X光筛查检查中被识别出来，从而可以更早地发现癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/AI-aids-in-early-detection-of-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/AI-aids-in-early-detection-of-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6fd572e1-6863-41f3-a08b-0900b033be7f Wed, 06 Dec 2023 23:57:00 -0500 AI aids in early detection of breast cancer
钙通道阻滞剂：血管痉挛性心绞痛孕妇的新希望一名希望怀孕的女性被诊断出患有严重血管痉挛性心绞痛（VSA）；然而，根据发表在《JACC 心脏产科特刊：病例报告》上的一个病例，在开始钙通道阻滞剂治疗后，她能够怀上健康的婴儿直至足月，且没有心绞痛发作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Calcium-channel-blockers-A-new-hope-for-pregnant-women-with-vasospastic-angina.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Calcium-channel-blockers-A-new-hope-for-pregnant-women-with-vasospastic-angina.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=62916eed-3371-4dc8-b5aa-120839d9c0ed Wed, 06 Dec 2023 23:49:28 -0500 Calcium channel blockers: A new hope for pregnant women with vasospastic angina
了解剥夺措施：公平公共卫生资源分配的关键在大流行期间，COVID-19 对黑人社区和有色人种社区的打击尤其严重。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Understanding-deprivation-measures-A-key-to-equitable-public-health-resource-allocation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Understanding-deprivation-measures-A-key-to-equitable-public-health-resource-allocation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f9779e7-4ca5-4bb4-b303-00f1d5a1f5e7 Wed, 06 Dec 2023 23:26:00 -0500 Understanding deprivation measures: A key to equitable public health resource allocation
PFAS 暴露与年轻人骨骼脆弱有关全氟烷基物质和多氟烷基物质 (PFAS) 是食品包装和化妆品等产品中使用的人造化学品，可能导致生殖问题、癌症风险增加和其他健康问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/PFAS-exposure-linked-to-weaker-bones-in-young-people.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/PFAS-exposure-linked-to-weaker-bones-in-young-people.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1ee9237f-421b-4c71-9017-7348a83327b6 Wed, 06 Dec 2023 23:06:46 -0500 PFAS exposure linked to weaker bones in young people
